name: MineBreak
description: Mine break is a 2D puzzle solving platformer, The Game is about a miner stuck in  a mine, and trying to get out by destroying obstacles, solving puzzles, and avoiding traps. You will need to think of the outcomes before taking actions, wrong moves will leave you with no way out. You, as a player, will be taking risky decisions, especially when destroying  rocks. You will be limited in (weapons), making it necessary to plan before using them. Equipped   with a light that has limited charge, you will be challenged to find a way out of the mine before the light battery dies.
